title: My friends account was hacked.
body: A while back my friend used to play league of legends and then during May I believe, his computer broke down and he couldn't play games anymore so today, he got his computer back, but when he tried to log onto his league account he wasn't able to. We checked his match history, someone was playing on his account in SEVERAL games. He's trying to get his account back, but he can't submit a ticket or can't contact with RIOT support system in anyway due to him not being able to actually sign in to any account to make a claim that his account was hacked. How can he contact RIOT for his account back if you need to LOG IN to actually send a ticket?

replies.body:
Your friend can reach out in a support ticket using [*this specific form*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), since it doesn't require him to sign in and is used **exclusively** for account recoveries.

Let me know if you have any other questions. I hope this helped!
